testcase.title: Verify side by side viewer under explore menu and regulatory accordion

steps.title: I logged in as a "RIDualUser2" user with access to "MedicalDevice" project
the page "Home" should be loaded on log on
I click on "Explore Menu" link on new Home Page

substeps.message: Regulatory Intelligence is displayed as expected

steps.title: I check that "Regulatory Intelligence" is open and coloured "green"

substeps.message: Side by side document viewer button is displayed on 'Explore' menu

steps.title: I check 'Side by side document viewer' button is displayed on 'Explore' menu
I click on 'Side by side document viewer' button on 'Explore' menu

substeps.message: Side by side viewer pop up window is displayed

steps.title: I verify 'Side By Side Viewer' pop up window is displayed
I expand "Regulatory Intelligence" Accordion in Home Page

substeps.message: Side by Side document Viewer button is displayed on homepage

steps.title: I check 'Side by side document viewer' button is displayed on 'Regulatory Intelligence' Accordion
I click on 'Side by side document viewer' button on 'Regulatory Intelligence' Accordion

substeps.message: Side by side viewer pop up window is displayed

steps.title: I verify 'Side By Side Viewer' pop up window is displayed
